data.description: Coulomb Collisions, Boltzmann equation, Fokker-Planck methods, dynamical friction, neoclassical diffusion, collision operators radiation processes and experimental applications. Basic knowledge of plasmas [such asPHYSICS/​E C E/​N E  525] and advanced electromagnetics [such asPHYSICS 721orE C E 740] strongly encouraged.
data.title: PLASMA KINETIC THEORY AND RADIATION PROCESSES
